title: Too Fat to Kill?
description: In this Dateline classic, a devoted father is gunned down in his New Jersey home. An unusual defense brought the case into the national spotlight when the suspect agued he was simply too obese to carry out the killing. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 23, 2010.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
